#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This open source library aims to help the implementation of JSON-RPC clients in android applications. 

= Getting started =
The library provides the class JSONRPCHttpClient to perform JSON-RPC method calls on remote services.


{{{
JSONRPCHttpClient client = new JSONRPCHttpClient("http://service/uri");

try 
{
  String string = client.callString("mymethod"); double d = client.callDouble("pow", x, y);
  int i = client.callInt("add", 56, 25); ...
}
catch (JSONRPCException e)
{
  e.printStackTrace();
}
}}}
